# Signing Up For Payroll As A Worker

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/signing-up-for-payroll-as-a-worker/

## Category
09 Staff And Payroll

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
PAYROLL PROCESSING
WORKER ONBOARDING FOR PAYROLL
Signing Up for Payroll as a Worker

To sign up for payroll as a worker, open the email invitation sent to you by your employer and select Set up now.

Select Get started to begin the signup process.

Continue the signup process by entering the required information, including your direct deposit details.

Once you’ve completed the signup process, your employer will review your information to ensure you are ready for payday.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.

© Mangomint, Inc. All rights reserved.
